name: Austin Gil (Vuetensils creator)
quote: Oh @TheJaredWilcurt, you are an angel, and I am not deserving of your PRs. Thank you!

name: Luke Diebold (Views On Vue cohost)
quote: This one was a lot of fun! @TheJaredWilcurt is a smart guy

name: Kalalau Cantrell
quote: Had a great time, learned a good deal about the tools behind desktop apps. Also, it was an added bonus to see a little bit of what Vue can do. Thanks for putting the course together!

name: Jagged Software
quote: All good points. I wish I could code like you can write.

name: Gavyn Leavitt
quote: Now I can start organizing my CSS in a meaningful way!

name: Mark McConnell
quote: Great workshop. It was amazing to see web code transformed into a desktop app!

name: Wiktor Wiśniewski
quote: I was working on my first commercial app ever, in NW.js. I remember getting help from @TheJaredWilcurt with some bug. If not for your help back then, I don't think I would be here now. You are the best!

name: Tara Miller
quote: Upgrading Your CSS was informative, interesting and fun. I got a ton out of it.

name: Mark Loeser
quote: I really enjoyed it and learned a lot of things that I plan on putting into practice.

name: Deon Seifert
quote: This was really informative! Thanks so much!

name: mrcommentsandstuffz
quote: After self-teaching Illustrator for the last couple of years, coming across this has been great! This is by far THE BEST Pen Tool tutorial out there! Great work Jared!﻿

name: Felix Rivera
quote: This is awesome, the first tutorial to show how to work with Sass in the windows environment. In addition it covers all of the missing information posted in other videos. Great job!﻿

name: Professor Deverell (NYU)
quote: Scout-App really helped my students understand the process of working with Sass before creating our own npm script for Node-Sass.

name: David Yang
quote: Jared did an awesome job at resolving the issues or misunderstandings that anyone had. It was awesome to get to build the desktop app.

name: David Ragsdale
quote: The explanations and slides were very well prepared and progressed nicely.

name: Alex Wasik
quote: Five Stars. Jared was great. Really knowledgeable.

name: Dave Dozier
quote: Really great intro into the capabilities of Vue-Router. Thanks Jared!
